page.title: 15NEWS IN WIRRAL. 20-6-1985
page.content: {MOTORCYCLE NUISANCE} Following complaints from local residents, about the noise and danger caused by young motorcyclists in Storeton Woods, the police have warned the riders to stay away. Apart from breaking the law by riding on common land without permission, they could be sued if they were uninsured and were to injure a person or an animal.{ {MORE POLICE ON THE BEAT IN PRENTON} About 750 people have signed a petition asking for more police patrols in the Prenton Dell area, because of the increase in vandalism and break-ins. {PRENTON CORNER SHOPS NEED SUPPORT Local shopkeepers in Woodchurch Lane have formed a group to attract business back to their shops. They want the road widened, more parking, and the one-way sytem scrapped.
